properties.name: blog.title
properties.description: Main title for DevPub blog. This and blog.subtitle properties are displayed in title tag of blog's web page.

properties.name: blog.subtitle
properties.description: Subtitle for DevPub blog. This and blog.title properties are displayed in title tag of blog's web page.

properties.name: blog.phone
properties.description: Phone number to contact with blog's owner.

properties.name: blog.email
properties.description: Email to contact with blog's owner.
